name: Find me...
description:
"Annette wake up in the middle of the night.
Someone is calling her.
Who is he?
Where is he?"

English and spanish languages available!!

Author note: This is the first game I made. Is the first time I use RPGmaker. It's short but probably I will continue it in the future. I hope you enjoy it! I want to thank my friend and tester xXcarlos117Xx2 for his help (especially with the english translation)

PandaMaru >> thanks for the fantastic tile set

YouFulca  (https://wingless-seraph.net/en/index.html) >> thanks for for his incredible music tracks.
